dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, Kazakhstan says it's, like, cracking down on drug trafficking. You actually buy that? Or is this just, you know, more talk?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, Kazakhstan says it's, like, cracking down on drug trafficking. You actually buy that? Or is this just, you know, more talk?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, President Tokayev is definitely calling it a, uh, pressing national challenge. Said it at the National Kurultai.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, President Tokayev is definitely calling it a, uh, pressing national challenge. Said it at the National Kurultai.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakh President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev has emphasized the importance of combating drug trafficking in the country, calling it one of the most pressing national challenges. Speaking on the issue at the fourth session of the National Kurultai...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "Pressing national challenge." Right. So pressing that their current "Comprehensive Plan" is ending this year. And they're just now talking about preparing a new one?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pressing national challenge. Right. So pressing that their current Comprehensive Plan is ending this year. And they're just now talking about preparing a new one?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This year marks the end of the Comprehensive Plan to Combat Drug Abuse and Drug Trafficking, which was introduced in 2023. ... Therefore, the preparation of a new plan should begin immediately," the president stated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: He did say the preparation, um, should begin immediately.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He did say the preparation, um, should begin immediately.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Therefore, the preparation of a new plan should begin immediately," the president stated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Immediately. So there's, what, a gap? Like, no plan in place for a while? How does that work?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Immediately. So there's, what, a gap? Like, no plan in place for a while? How does that work?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: He stressed that work on, like, matters crucial to the future must continue without interruption.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He stressed that work on, like, matters crucial to the future must continue without interruption.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tokayev noted that work on matters crucial to Kazakhstanâ„¢s future must continue without interruption.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Without interruption? While one plan expires and the next one hasn't even been written yet? That sounds, uh, less than seamless, frankly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Without interruption? While one plan expires and the next one hasn't even been written yet? That sounds, uh, less than seamless, frankly.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But he emphasized that fighting this, um, social evil is a top priority.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But he emphasized that fighting this, um, social evil is a top priority.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Fighting this social evil is one of our top priorities.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Top priority with an expired roadmap. Got it. And what's even in these plans, you know? Just, like, vaguely stated goals?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Top priority with an expired roadmap. Got it. And what's even in these plans, you know? Just, like, vaguely stated goals?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The article mentioned the National Security Committee disrupted, uh, a drug trafficking channel.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The article mentioned the National Security Committee disrupted, uh, a drug trafficking channel.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Previously, the National Security Committee reported the disruption of a drug trafficking channel.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A channel. Just one? Wow, groundbreaking. How many are there, really? A hundred? A thousand?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A channel. Just one? Wow, groundbreaking. How many are there, really? A hundred? A thousand?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, it's, um, an effort. A step.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, it's, um, an effort. A step.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A step. Or, like, a press release. I'm just saying, it sounds a lot like political posturing to me.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A step. Or, like, a press release. I'm just saying, it sounds a lot like political posturing to me.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: He did say a document like that is, uh, essential.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He did say a document like that is, uh, essential.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is clear that such a document is essential for us.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Essential, yes. That's why it's, like, expiring without a replacement ready. Yeah, that makes perfect sense.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Essential, yes. That's why it's, like, expiring without a replacement ready. Yeah, that makes perfect sense.
